name: Elise
description: A Nohrian princess who loves her siblings and has matured a little by taking a solo trip to a tropical island. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.
insights: Elise is the only hero with Hibiscus Tome+.
Elise is the only hero with Hibiscus Tome.
Elise is the only hero with G Tome Valor 3.
Elise is the only hero with G Tome Valor 2.
Elise is the only hero with G Tome Valor 1.

dialogue.text: I'm Princess Elise of Nohr! I was playing on a tropical island, but...this place looks pretty fun, too!
Hi, <Player Name>! You should try fighting in a swimsuit, too. It'll keep you nice and cool, and it's real easy to move around!
Before coming here, I fought a big battle to win a trip to a tropical island. And I won thanks to Arthur and Effie!
Anyone who works as hard as you deserves a reward—so, here! I made you a lei out of tropical flowers!
I think the whole Order of Heroes should go for a great big swim together! Though, I guess it would be bad if the enemy attacked while we were all at the beach...
I took a trip to a tropical island all by myself. Doesn't that sound...mature? I'm inching closer to being a perfect lady, aren't I? Well, aren't I?
I'm here with greetings just for you! I was sent by <Friend Name>! Say... Is there somewhere around here I can take a quick dip before I head back?
Is this the summer Princess Elise finally becomes a mature lady?!
Is this what my big sis meant by "Summer helps a lady mature"?
Huh, what?! OK, I'll stop playing and start concentrating. Promise!
This new power kinda makes me want a new swimsuit to go with it.

Tropical attaaaaack! Hyah!! Heehee, did I scare you? Seeing you just got me so excited! That tropical island was a lot of fun, but I've really come to love the Askran Kingdom, too. Everyone in the Order of Heroes is just so nice, and I get to play with so many new people! But... Well, can you keep a secret? I have the most fun playing with you, <Player Name>! I always look forward to your visits! Hey, when we're all done fighting someday, let's visit the beach together. Pinky swear! That makes it a promise!
